title: Acupuncture & Oriental Medicine in California | Athreya Ayurveda
author: ALISSA MORENO
description: Embrace the healing power of the age old Oriental medicine and Acupuncture to be relieved of ailments and for better health. Consult our Acupuncture experts today.
cleaned_text: What is Acupuncture? Acupuncture is a traditional chinese practice that involves puncturing points on the body that increase blood and energy flow to open energy pathways. The is of Acupuncture The use of needles is one of the ancient techniques used in needles are inserted into specific points in the to stimulate the flow of ("qi") thereby effective preventing premature wrinkling of facial skin. Vaidya Parla Jayagopal is of the most gifted and beautiful spirited ayurvedic doctors and teacher I have met and worked with. Not only does he successfully treat my health issues but I truly feel it is his greatest passion, intention and talent to make you believe in your own power to heal oneself and to inspire you to further participate in making positive change out there. I professional expertise, insight and highly intuitive treatment. I initially went to see Vaidya Jay at the request of my daughter. She had been to him and couldn't say enough good things about him. I was apprehensive at first.
